name: Scuba Diving Adventure
description:
Jet around the world for shark diving, shore diving, cave diving! Coral reefs, schools of fish, hammerheads, great whites, and over 100 types of animals and 8 locations with 24 dive sites are featured!

- Bonaire, start from the shore, walk out and see the most amazing animals and coral shoals, including green turtles, lion fish, and schools of amberjacks.

- Hawaii, start from a boat and encounter countless sharks, rays, and barracudas.

- Maldives, this location features very dense variety of fish, sharks, and coral reefs.

- Galapagos, get surrounded by hammerheads from a boat dive! Cave diving, underwater arches, and unusual coral formations are some of the highlights.

- Cozumel, enjoy drift diving, cave diving, coral arches, and very large fish, enormous grouper, and lots of sharks.

- Bali, this location features very dense variety of fish, sharks, and coral reefs.

- Great Barrier Reef, the world's largest reef, features a wide array of exotic fish, sharks, and dense schools of fish.

- Red Sea, wreck diving is a big highlight here, as well as unusual animals found nowhere else.

Keep track of your air, depth and find unique creatures on each dive site!

Explore, identify, adventure!
